top: The president's positive Covid-19 diagnosis, which he made public in a tweet early on Friday, has upended his election campaign.

A series of statements on Saturday painted a confusing picture, but the latest update from Mr Trump's physician, Dr Sean Conley, says "while not yet out of the woods, the team remains cautiously optimistic" about the president's condition.
And in his latest public comments on his condition, Mr Trump said he is "starting to feel good" and is looking forward to "finishing up the [election] campaign the way it was started".

Trump says he is doing well, but next co: I think I'll be back soon.
And we're going to beat it soundly."
